subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Outfielder So Taguchi, who hit .290 for St. Louis last season, signed a one-year contract with Philadelphia on Sunday.The 38-year-old Taguchi led all National League pinch-hitters with a .406 (13 for 32) batting average.Taguchi played all three outfield positions for the Cardinals in 2007, starting 41 times in center field, 21 times in left field and twice in right.“Taguchi gives our team more defensive versatility in the outfield,” the Phillies assistant general manager Ruben Amaro Jr. said in a statement. “And he has proven over his career that he can get key hits in big situations.”As a member of the World Series champion Cardinals in 2006, Taguchi hit .400 with two homers and four runs batted in in the playoffs. He started three of the five World Series games.
